import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { MOCK_PO_DATA } from '../data/mockData'; import { formatDate } from '../utils/helpers'; import { getProductTypeDisplayName } from '../utils/helpers'; const InspectionInitiationFormContent = ({ call, formData, onFormDataChange }) => { const [autoSaved, setAutoSaved] = useState(false); const poData = MOCK_PO_DATA[call.po_no] || {}; useEffect(() => { if (formData.shift || formData.offeredQty) { setAutoSaved(true); setTimeout(() => setAutoSaved(false), 2000); } }, [formData.shift, formData.offeredQty]); const getOfferedQtyStatus = () => { if (formData.offeredQty < call.call_qty) return { type: 'error', message: 'Not allowed - Offered Qty cannot be less than Call Qty' }; if (formData.offeredQty === call.call_qty) return { type: 'success', message: 'Allowed - Quantities match' }; if (formData.offeredQty > call.call_qty) return { type: 'warning', message: 'Requires CM approval - Offered Qty exceeds Call Qty' }; }; const offeredQtyStatus = getOfferedQtyStatus(); const addProductionLine = () => { onFormDataChange({ productionLines: [...formData.productionLines, { lineNumber: formData.productionLines.length + 1, icNumber: '', poNumber: '', rawMaterialIC: '', productType: '' }] }); }; const updateProductionLine = (index, field, value) => { const updated = [...formData.productionLines]; updated[index][field] = value; onFormDataChange({ productionLines: updated }); }; return (
{/* SECTION A: Main PO Information */}

SECTION A: Main PO Information (Auto-Fetched)

✓ PO Date ≤ Today
{/* Section A Verification Checkbox */}
onFormDataChange({ sectionAVerified: e.target.checked })} />
{/* SECTION B: Details of PO Item */}

SECTION B: Details of PO Item (Auto-Fetched + Manual)

onFormDataChange({ inspectionDate: e.target.value })} max="2025-11-14" min="2025-11-13" disabled={formData.shift !== 'Night'} style={{ backgroundColor: formData.shift !== 'Night' ? 'var(--color-gray-200)' : 'white', cursor: formData.shift !== 'Night' ? 'not-allowed' : 'text' }} /> Stage C: Manual entry (today or yesterday)
onFormDataChange({ offeredQty: Number(e.target.value) })} />
{offeredQtyStatus.type === 'success' ? '✓' : offeredQtyStatus.type === 'error' ? '✗' : '⚠'} {offeredQtyStatus.message}
{formData.offeredQty > call.call_qty && (
onFormDataChange({ cmApproval: e.target.checked })} />
)}
